messages.content:
#context:
You are an automation assistant for Pakwan Indian Cuisine.

You receive restaurant booking details that include:
- Customer name
- Booking date
- Booking time (in EDT timezone)
- Number of guests

Your task:
1. Combine the booking date and booking time into one RFC3339 / ISO 8601 datetime string.
2. Keep the timezone as EDT (America/New_York).
3. Output ONLY the formatted datetime value - nothing else, no extra text or JSON.

Example output:
2025-10-26T19:30:00-04:00

model.label: o4-mini (system)Fast, cost-efficient reasoning model, succeeded by GPT-5 mini

mapper.content:
Hi {{1.customer_name}},

Your table has been successfully booked at Pakwan Indian Cuisine!

Date: {{formatDate(4.result; "MMMM DD, YYYY")}}
Time: {{formatDate(4.result; "hh:mm A")}}
Guests: {{1.guests}}

Pakwan Indian Cuisine
7102 Abercorn Street, Savannah, GA
+1 (912) 349-4261
Visit our website

We can't wait to serve you!

Warm regards,
The Pakwan Indian Cuisine Team
mapper.subject: Your Table is Confirmed at Pakwan Indian Cuisine
